title: TB email - Cannot see any e-mails past 30 days...?
content:
Recently something changed in my e-mail which I have used for years in conjunction with G-mail hosted accounts / service (google workspace). I do not know if I clicked the wrong setting or what in either... I just know that I cannot see any emails over 30 days in any folder - regardless. And now many folders show no emails in because of no emails have been sent or received within the past 30 days in them. These store many "deals in the works" and notes from pasty dealings... I really need to access these but do not know how or where to find them... any help you can offer?

I'm 65 and have used this email for about 20 plus years... off and on have had problems that I have been able to get through but cannot get this one solved? Help!!

title: SMTP kiszolgáló
content: Üdv! Nem tudok levelet küldeni egyik postafiókomból sem. Annyi történt, hogy 10 napra elutaztam és lekapcsoltam a számítógépet. Most csak fogadni tudok, küldeni nem. Ezt a hibaüzenetet kapom: Az üzenet küldése sikertelen. Az üzenet küldése sikertelen, mert nem lehetett kapcsolatot teremteni a levélküldő (SMTP) kiszolgálóval (mail.t-online.hu). A kiszolgáló elérhetetlen, vagy visszautasítja az SMTP kapcsolatokat. Ellenőrizze, hogy a levélküldő (SMTP) kiszolgáló beállításai helyesek-e, és próbálja meg újra. Több különböző fiókom van, de mindegyikhez ugyanezt az üzenetet kapom. Köszönettel: Attila
creator: senju1049

title: I can't log in to my Google Family Link child account with Thunderbird

Thunderbird version is 115.

title: Getting inbox copied to Local Folders - Unable to set path error
content:
Hi,

In Thunderbird (fresh install of 115.01) on Win 10,

I'm trying to set my (pop) Server Settings Local Directory to:

C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders

that is where years of my prior emails are stored. I can see them in the Local Folders.

I'm just trying to make my Verizon mail save locally into that location also.

However, I get the error:

The Local Directory path "C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders" is not suitable for message storage. Please choose another directory.

Why exactly is Thunderbird choking on that path? What can I do about it?

This is the path where all my history is stored. I moved there from the Appdata/Roaming area, which has the same problem!

Many thanks to anyone who can provide a precise answer!
creator: steve.johns
